doc.field: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives Collection of Communist and Socialist Serials
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives Collection of Communist and Socialist Serials

This series collects 1,260 publications -- serials, journals, magazines, newsletters, bulletins, pamphlets, and reports -- issued by a variety of local and national parties, organizations, political organizers, commentators, and affiliated interest groups in the United States. The majority of the series collects regularly published bulletins, newsletters, and newspapers, circulating news and discussion within communities of Communist Party members and activists. One-off reports and occasional papers address a variety of topics in detail, including working regulations, meetings and conventions, and Communist and Socialist movements abroad. Well represented serials in this collection include Burning Spear, Freedom Socialist, The Militant, Socialist Workers Party's Bulletin, and the Central Committee of the Workers League's Bulletin, alongside various titles dedicated to social justice issues intersecting with communist and socialist thought, among them the Gay Socialist Newsletter, Asians in Struggle, and publications dedicated to groups affiliated with the Democratic Socialists of America (including DSA Green News, Socialist Perspectives on Race, and the Democratic Socialists of America Feminist Commission's Not Far Enough).
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives Collection of Communist and Socialist Serials
